column4: Hello. I am getting a 'panic' when trying to boot off an Ubuntu cd and am not sure what to do at all. I'm very new to linux, and am unfamiliar with many things, so sorry in advance (hehe). If anybody can help me, what information do you need?
First thing you could do is to check whether the CD image is fine. Thereâ€™s an option in the boot menu.
